Articles.Content:
I know there is a plug in that has stored power that can be recharged, but that\'s a plugin and not a part.

Has anyone actually made a part yet? Something that links solar panels to battery\'s and then engines run off the battery? I had a search but all I could find were concepts, plugins and no real parts yet. Cheers.
I\'ve made a plugin for CardBoardBoxProcessor to use with his solar panels and a VASIMIR engine he is working on. He will probably release it soon, but I can\'t tell when.
